Member Function Documentation

static consumerToken ( $  consumer_key,
$  consumer_secret 
) [static]

generate a valid consumer token

Parameters:
consumer_key - should come from api config
consumer_secret - should come from api config
permutation - varies the token, default varies by session id. Use this to generate state-free tokens
static consumerTokenForAPI ( $  api_name  )  [static]

ensures that consumer requests come from a known session

Returns:
returns a token to be included in requests to consumers
